```{r}
library(tidyverse)
diamonds %>% filter(y>10)
diamonds %>% arrange(desc(y)) %>% select (y)
glimpse(diamonds)

```


```{r}

ggplot(data = diamonds) + 
       geom_boxplot(aes(x = cut, y = price)) +
       coord_flip()
x = reorder(cut, price, FUN = median())
```
